hackathon-description-text: Superposition is a hackathon aimed at high school girls in the Bay Area of all experience levels and backgrounds. This event is free and we'll provide Wi-Fi, food, swag, and workspace!
hackathon-rules: All attendees, sponsors, partners, volunteers and staff at our hackathon are required to agree with the following code of conduct. Organizers will enforce this code throughout the event. We expect cooperation from all participants to ensure a safe environment for everybody.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: - Colorful LED Illuminated Backlit USB Wired Gaming Keyboard
- Art of Problem Solving Gift Certificate $40

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1000 E Hillsdale Blvd, Foster City, CA 94404, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Based on design, UX and UI

hackathon-location-address: 1000 E Hillsdale Blvd, Foster City, CA 94404, USA
hackathon-description-header: Superposition’s mission is to provide a safe, welcoming, and supportive space for high school girls to delve into the realm of technology.
